attributes.action: Scientific research for those not working
attributes.additional_details: Utilise web based research tools such as Galaxy Zoo to provide full time work for those not in employment or unable to work. These genuine and valuable research tools give people an opportunity to assist with cutting edge research which helps society as a whole and is something to be proud of. There is unlimited analysis to be done so there is no danger of taking others jobs or impacting competition in the market. The analysis can be done by anyone and it would be simple to check to make sure people are doing it properly and spending enough time on it.
